item.description:
A remake of the Arnold Schwarzeneggar action sci-fi classic! Doug Quaid (Colin Farrell) longs for excitement. He goes to a company called Rekall which implants memories of a nice vacation in your mind. He opts for the spy-adventure package and it awakens suppressed memories of being an actual spy. He teams up with Jessica Biel against Bryan Cranston and Kate Beckinsale (his wife). Or is it all part of the fantasy?

Total RecallÂ is at 7:00 at West Boylston Cinema. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:30. Call or text my cell phone at 508-981-0455 if you need to reach me.

Anyone who wants to can join me for drinks and eats at O'Connor's after the movie.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I look like my photo.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Total Recall
